sourcesContent:
import { Container } from '../../style'; const HowTogGetReadyInFirstClass = () => { return (
  1. Familiarize yourself with the features of Jitsi. Before joining the class, try to learn the basic controls of Jitsi. You can learn more by clicking this video. Once you are familiar with the features of Jitsi, you can now help your children to join the class.
  2. Join the classroom using your learner’s account. You can do this by going to the class’s profile, determining which student you will enroll, and clicking the “Enroll Now” button
  3. Turn on your camera during class. We encourage your students to open their video cameras when the class starts. This allows our teacher to verify the identity of the student and allows them to interact more effectively with them.
  4. Read about our other guides and policies. Review our other guides{' '} here to learn more about how our classes work and what to do in case of issues. We also recommend reading about our Parent’s and Learner’s Conduct in our{' '} Community Standards .

 

If you experience tech issues...

Check out our Jitsi’s comprehensive{' '} Jitsi Handbook

Note: Teachers will do their best to assist you if you experience tech issues during class, but remember - their primary focus is on creating an excellent learning experience for all learners, so their ability to troubleshoot with individual families is limited.{' '}

); }; export default HowTogGetReadyInFirstClass;
